page.title: 18RECREATION
page.content: The most popular hobbies seem to be reading,knitting or sewing,swimming,watching television,gardening,football,cycling and walking.The majority spent 4 hours a week on their hobby.most travelled to their hobby(to the baths say). The majority did their hobby for pleasure and relaxation.some did it to keep fit,gain knowledge,make friends,or save money.A few enjoyed competing against others. A large number of people would like to see a leisure centre including a large swimming pool developed in the area. Many would like to see existing facilities for young children improved and activities for teenageers extended.
